title: Hour 3 - Officiating Is Hard, Bob Harig
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Officiating Is Hard, Bob Harig
description:
Dan talks about the trials and tribulations of professional referees, umpires and officials of all kinds. And Bob Harig stops by for a chat from the British Open.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
